subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Roger Federer reached his first final of the year by beating Denis Gremelmayr, 2-6, 7-5, 6-1, in the Estoril Open semifinals in Oeiras, Portugal. He will play Nikolay Davydenko, who defeated Florent Serra, 6-2, 6-2.
snippet: Top-ranked Roger Federer reached his first final of the year by beating Denis Gremelmayr, 2-6, 7-5, 6-1, in the Estoril Open semifinals in Oeiras, Portugal. He will play Nikolay Davydenko, who defeated Florent Serra, 6-2, 6-2.
